Content: @Regnar makes sense. It wouldn't surprise me that a smart hacker could infiltrate an exchange as a collaborator and walk away with the funds as soon as he has access to infrastructure.

Author: chin#5866
Content: Hi guys I'm new here

Author: chin#5866
Content: Can i know what does the voting do? And what are we voting for? Is there any incentives for voting?

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: @chin Komodo holders vote for their favorite candidate to secure the network by running a notary node. The incentive is electing capable operators to secure the kmd blockchain.

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Here are the instructions https://komodoplatform.com/third-annual-notary-node-election/

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: And candidate list https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/NotaryNodes/tree/master/notarynodes
